name: Speed RPG
description:
Tips :
  • After the first battle, you enter the city. You better buy a weapon and a piece of armor and to equip them before going to the quest menu.
  • You also gain 10 stat points per level, you can attribute them in the statistics menu.
  • If you want to cheat, you can do the Konami code to get money
  • If you press enter, it activate the DEV mode with some more sprites and light effects. It also deactivate the 10 color palette.
  • If you press B in battle you open your inventory and can use purchased potions to heal yourself.
  • Some monsters hit in magic attack, some with physical attack. Compose your armor thoughtfully.
  • Shock and Endurance arn't properly implemented yet, you can ignore those stats.
The last Stage is a volcanic area, full of demons and dragons can you reach and beat it ? Controls :

Keyboard

  • A = Space/Num9/Num3/NumDot
  • B = B/LeftAlt/Num7/Num1/Num0
  • Start = Enter/Num5
  • Left = LeftArrow/Num4/A
  • Right = RightArrow/Num6/D
  • TOP = UpArrow/Num8/W
  • DOWN = DownArrow/Num2/S

Controller

  • A = A/X/RightBumper
  • B = B/Y/LeftBumper
  • Start = Menu
  • Move = D-PAD
